mapper.select:
SELECT bankbase.BANKNO, bankbase.BANKNM, bankbase.BANK_SITE, bankbase.EBANK_URL, bankbase.TELBANK, bankbase.LINK_MAN, bankbase.LINK_MAN_TEL, bankbase.LINK_MAN_FAX, bankbase.LINK_MAN_EMAIL, bankbase.DIS_ORDER, bankbase.DIS_FLAG, bankbase.STATUS, bankbase.C_MAN, bankbase.C_TIME, bankbase.E_MAN, bankbase.E_TIME FROM bankbase WHERE
bankbase.BANKNO = #{bankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
bankbase.STATUS <> 'N'
